message: Let's be reasonable, 60-40 is a good starting point.
How about we meet in the middle? 45/55 seems fair.
I can do 58-42, it's as low as I'm willing to go for now.
Time is running out, Alice.  48/52 is my final offer.
I'll try 57-43, but I'm not going much lower.
Alice, let's be real, the inflation is hurting you more than me. 50/50 is the only fair deal at this point.
